x31x2e Xa →〈  ZX1, x63x6fx6dx70x75x74x65x72x73 x61x6ex64 X1〉
x32x2e Xb →〈X14X2,X1 x61x72x65 X2〉
x33x2e Xc →〈C x2c x63x65x6cx6c x70x68x6fx6ex65x73 〉

⇒〈  ZC 4Xd, x63x6fx6dx70x75x74x65x72x73 x61x6ex64 x63x65x6cx6c x70x68x6fx6ex65x73 x61x72x65 Xd〉
⇒〈  ZC 4Xe{  , x63x6fx6dx70x75x74x65x72x73 x61x6ex64 x63x65x6cx6c x70x68x6fx6ex65x73 x61x72x65 x69x6ex76x65x6ex74x69x6fx6ex73 x6fx66 Xe〉
⇒〈  ZC 4 ˙{  , x63x6fx6dx70x75x74x65x72x73 x61x6ex64 x63x65x6cx6c x70x68x6fx6ex65x73 x61x72x65 x69x6ex76x65x6ex74x69x6fx6ex73 x6fx66 x74x68x65 x6cx61x73x74 x63x65x6ex74x75x72x79〉
x46x69x67x75x72x65 x32x3a x54x68x65 x64x65x72x69x76x61x74x69x6fx6e x74x68x61x74 x6cx65x61x64x73 x74x6f x74x68x65 x63x6fx72x72x65x63x74 x74x72x61x6ex73x6cx61x74x69x6fx6e
